About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and why I do it...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

At one point or another you've probably been in my shoes. Wondering what you're going to do with your life and what carreer you are going to follow. For some, you've known since childhood. As for most of us, we spent most of our adolescence, or even our adulthood finding our place in this world. As for me, my road has not been a direct path. I've spent a good majority of my life cultivating a number of various skill sets. I entered the workforce in the customer service industry. I quickly transitioned those skills to financial industry. This was certainly more challenging, but giving out loans and opening IRA's was not fulfilling. I even tried blue collar labor, spending 10 hours a night operating heavy equipment. Alas, I was not to settle. I'm highly driven and extremly passionate and I desired a career I could pour my best self into. I took a leap of faith and put my two weeks notice in. I signed up for some software development courses and have never looked back. What has started as a seed of curiosity, has blossomed into a burning passion. I love what I do, and what I do is with pride.
